title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Accessing Moccasin Bend
body: Accessing Moccasin Bend National Archeological District         Moccasin Bend National Archeological District sign off Moccasin Bend Road Friends of Moccasin Bend National Park  Public access on National Park Service property at Moccasin Bend National Archeological District is at the Blue Blazes Trail. The following procedures are in place to access other areas of the district: Two weeks prior to arrival, groups must contact Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park. Please call 423-752-5213 x117 or email to request approval. Once groups gain approval for a date and time to visit, a National Park Service Ranger must be present with the respective group at all times while on Moccasin Bend National Archeological District. You may click here to retrieve a .pdf version of this information.
